question: Ava and Joshua have 139 minutes to walk to the cinema together. It takes them 9 minutes to get to the corner where the library is. It takes them another 12 minutes to get to the bank. How much longer do they have to get to cinema without being late?
answer:
Ava and Joshua arrive at the library with 139 - 9 = <<139-9=130>>130 minutes left to reach the bank.
They then arrive at the bank and have 130 - 12 = <<130-12=118>>118 minutes left to get to cinema without being late.
#### 118
